name: Steel Soul
description:
Steel Soul is an action RPG game. Possessing many features that help increase the player's experience during the game.
-Multi-Skill system:
There are many skills with many different abilities such as combat support, healing and more.

-Weapon classes:
You can choose between bows, spears, large swords or swords to find the weapon that best suits you.

-Diverse defense and attack system:
In a battle, good defense will give you a certain advantage, you can dodge or block attacks from enemies or you can even Parry to get advantage.
With a variety of weapons combined with attack combos you can create your own fighting style.

-System for making and purchasing items:
Collect materials on your way and use them to create powerful equipment or buy them from NPCs.

-Many types of items and equipment:
There are many items and treasure chests scattered throughout the map for you to explore, there are types of equipment that have their own special skills and give you great power, find them and conquer the land.
